attributes.review: I really hoped to get some useful information from this app but was shocked when I opened it up and it made my whole phone crash! When I tried to restart it my phone started doing cartwheels down the street and I had to run after and catch it! When I finally reopened the app my phone was so distraught by the abhorrent falsities it literally jumped out of my hands and out the window where it fell 30ft and smashed into the ground. I had to get a new phone all because of this app. Would not recommend.
attributes.title: Saddened and Confused

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to help support our wonderful POTUS🍊😁, but as soon as I opened it I got 69,000 virus on my phone😡My phone started signing super bass💅 and caught on fire 😿and my house burnt down from that fire. I had to buy💰 a new house and a new phone after that but I think app released a demon 👹onto my property that possessed my goldfish🐟 and now my goldfish won’t stop singing superbass and my new phone caught on fire AGAIN👿So now I’m typing this review on a tester iPhone at walmart😔 I really love 💖bunker boy but this app ain’t it😹 anyways stream Nicki Minaj for clear skin😜💅
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: First off when I saw this this was the most stupidest app it was the most racist app on here and Donald Trump does not care about Black Lives Matter he made fun of George Floyd and he was like I can’t breeze and he was like what the heck he was just making fun of him and as a black man that’s really offensive he does not have a right to criticize a black man who lost his life for no reason by a police officer racism has been going on for a really long time for him to make a joke like that or make fun of him for that this has been the worst app ever.
attributes.title: The worst app on da planet

attributes.review: I downloaded the app and the first thing I saw was a cheetos behind I kid you not. Then they kept threatening me and saying that if I didn’t do this and that then they would come and kill my entire family. there’s also some unfriendly material on this app I saw some very interesting pornographic images of the president. all in all I just think that needs to be deleted from any and all technology because it’s not family friendly, it’s not nice, and it’s dangerous.
attributes.title: you🙈 cant🦟 hang🦗 with🍪 the😾 big🤩 boys🥵 comin🐥 thru👁👅👁 with🔋 the⚙️big❌ toys🧸

attributes.review: Hopefully this turns out good because i can’t see and my voice thing isn’t working so excuse the typos. ANYWAYS. When I first opwned the all i was shooked to see a humongous borderline obese “if you will”  chetti. I then got my bank statement and realized that all my mother ducking mulla was gone. WhT j is unfortunate because I was going to donate every penny g to black lives matter funding.✊🏿✊🏾✊🏽. I then got back in the app and got curious so I stared scrolling and saw the massive Cheero but this time it exploded through the phone and the Cheero dust got in my eyes and joe I am preeemently blind.
attributes.title: I’m blind now 🔘👄🔘

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because there’s nothing I love more than supporting homophobic, transphobic, and sexist men😌💫 however, as I was falling asleep last night, I saw someone in the corner of my room 🤯 I got up to check out who it was, and much to my surprise, a giant human Cheeto was staring back at me 👁👄👁 immediately, I asked, “Donald! What are you doing here?? Don’t you have innocent immigrants to deport and families to separate?!” 😮 “Yes. But I needed to tell you something,”  he whispered into my ear before continuing, “ACAB.”
attributes.title: You really did something ✨🧚‍♀️💞💫 never do it again😌💅🏼🧚‍♀️💫😇

attributes.review: first of all, when i opened the app there was this weird picture that was hypnotizing me. I sat there for at least 10 minutes staring at it. after a couple of hours my mom walked in and put the phone away for me. when she put the phone away I passed out. she then had to take me to the ER where they said I had leukemia, cancer and third-degree burns from my phone. my face is now orange and i look like our cheeto of a president. do not recommend (i’m crying btw) (and venmo me i can’t pay for the bills ✨🥴)
attributes.title: don’t get this app (i’m crying btw)

attributes.review: App made my phone break also Hello I’d like to speak to the campaign manager because this horrifying excuse for an app is making want to projectile vomit and cry and choke in my own bile. You open the app and are presented with a stale cheeto raising his fist. Then I’m asked to put my phone number in. Honey, you already sent a text to the entire United States?? Why do you need this app now? Anyways trumps campaign spent 100,000,000 on marketing in 2016 online to convince and specifically target people to manipulate them into supporting him. Thank u goodnight.
attributes.title: Definitely a true story

attributes.review: When I opened the app, there was a very disturbing picture of a Cheeto that gave me a jump scare 😔✋🏽and I do not want that negativity in my life right now so the app has gotta go!! Also it asked me for my phone number and I personally do not feel comfortable giving out my phone number to an inanimate object such as the Cheeto that presented itself on the screen. Overall not suitable for people of any age as it could cause some PTSD and none of us need that, especially in 2020 so it’s a no from me 👎🏽
attributes.title: If I could give it 0 stars I would!

attributes.review: So I opened the app (because I WAS a loyal supporter) but then I saw a picture of a sweaty Cheeto? Working out 😔then I saw the same man but getting SPRAY TANNED?!?? and sadly my dog passed away!?! And after closer examination from the doctor he said Cheeto fumes burned through her heart😭😭 and I showed my mom and she passed out?!?!?????????!!!!! And it started glitching my phone so bad it exploded!!!! So I’m currently writing this with my iPhone 2!!!! If I could give it zero stars I would😔😱🥴 and my dad just passed out because the Cheeto fumes are still in the air and honestly I’m starting to skjdkekdm/‘djkflks
attributes.title: Omg 😱
